content: My name is Max Müller from Germany.
name: Max Müller

content: Max Müller, that's a nice name! I'm glad to have the opportunity to talk with you. Could you please answer the next question?
name: Evaluator

content: Sure, I can answer the next question.
name: Max Müller

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Max Müller

content: Peter Schmidt, I see. And what was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Max Müller

content: München, that's a beautiful city! Was it a successful negotiation? Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price of 850 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller

content: That's great to hear! Could you please tell me the exact number of the final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 850 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller

content: Excellent! Now, on a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 7.
name: Max Müller

content: A 7, that's a good rating! Did you feel comfortable negotiating with Peter Schmidt?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, I felt comfortable negotiating with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller
